attributes.action: Conversion of Indian Driving licence to UK Driving licence and acceptance of Indian No Claim bonus certificate for applying for Car insurance
attributes.additional_details:
Conversion of Indian Driving licence to UK Driving licence and acceptance of Indian No Claim bonus certificate for applying for Car insurance.
When applying  for a car insurance quote ,the companies inviting do not accept the no claim bonus certificate of India and the driving licence from India as these companies accept the likes of Hongkong.Please make some provision for  the people from Indian origin to convert their Licence and use their no claim bonus certificate for insurance Quotes as it will reduce the insurance premium
